Financial plans

We invite you to take a look at the company's development plan for the next 5 years. It was compiled by the TRUST-FX leadership, in conjunction with leading experts from the marketing and analytical departments.

The TRUST-FX Company has more than 15 years of history and experience in the financial market. In accordance with the development plan, the company is constantly evolving and expanding, ahead of projections made earlier. Active work is being carried out in all directions: opening new offices, representative offices, composition of qualified personnel is growing, and with them, the number of satisfied investors. Each customer will appreciate the personal approach and the quality of TRUST-FX services.

For compiling data graphs , we used data taken from accounting documents, as well as from accounting financials on the implementation plans for the last period. In addition, we also used data obtained from the expert assessment of the economic market and forecasts of its changes.
